Hu said his nation welcomes U.S. companies and promised that China would treat fairly U.S. companies doing business there. "It all feels very, very good that you asked us to be a partner, Jim McNerney, the chief executive officer of Boeing, said to Hu at the start of the session. "This partnership with Nokia will accellerate, dramatically accelerate Windows phone ecosystem," said Steve Ballmer .
